name: tata-trust-rfp-response
description: Build system for Tata Trusts Data Visualization RFP Response
readme:
## Usage

1. Build HTML: `npm run build`
2. Convert to PDF: Open index.html in browser and use Print > Save as PDF
3. Clean generated files: `npm run clean`

## PDF Conversion

For professional PDF output:
- Open the generated HTML in Chrome/Firefox
- Press Ctrl+P (Cmd+P on Mac)
- Select 'Save as PDF'
- Ensure 'Background graphics' is enabled
- Use A4 paper size with default margins
